articles.description: The Premier League will review as a priority two controversial VAR decisions that saw Newcastle and West Ham United have crucial goals disallowed.
articles.content: The Premier League will review as a priority with Professional Game Match Officials Limited (PGMOL), the refereeing body, two controversial VAR decisions that saw Newcastle United and West Ham United… [+2186 chars]

articles.title: Amir takes three as Tallawahs make it two from two | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Guyana Amazon Warriors lost their CPL 2022 opener after posting a sub-par total
articles.content: Mohammad Amir returned figures of 3 for 22 as Jamaica Tallawahs restricted Guyana Amazon Warriors to a sub-par total of 142, which they chased down with four wickets and four balls to spare. The chas… [+2009 chars]

articles.title: Jadeja to undergo knee surgery, could miss T20 World Cup - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "The World Cup is still a fair bit away, and we don't want to jump to any conclusions," Dravid says
articles.content: News"The World Cup is still a fair bit away, and we don't want to jump to any conclusions," Dravid says
